actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-330.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 349) to authorize the participation of the United States in multi-national force and observers to implement the Treaty of Peace between Egypt and Israel.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 349 (Sinai peacekeeping force).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 349) to authorize the participation of the United States in multi-national force and observers to implement the Treaty of Peace between Egypt and Israel.
